title: Full React Application
description: Build a complete production-style React application from scratch

intro.title: Think Like a Product Team
intro.story: You are no longer building features. You are building a product.

concept.title: What Is a Full React App?
concept.content:
A full React application includes:

- Authentication
- API integration
- Global state
- Routing
- Error handling
- Deployment readiness

concept2.title: Application Features
concept2.content:
- Login and logout
- Protected pages
- CRUD operations
- API error handling
- Loading states

architecture.title: Project Architecture
architecture.content:
src/
- api/
- components/
- pages/
- layouts/
- hooks/
- store/
- utils/
- routes/

concept3.title: Data Flow
concept3.content:
User action → Component → State → API → UI update

This predictable flow keeps apps maintainable.

positive.title: API Service Layer
positive.explanation: Keeping API logic isolated makes components clean.

concept4.title: Authentication Flow
concept4.content:
1. User logs in
2. Token stored
3. Protected routes unlocked
4. Logout clears session

negative.title: Auth Bug
negative.description: User can access protected page after logout.
negative.question: What is missing?

options.explanation: Routing is not the root cause.

negative.lesson: Security depends on correct state management.

task.title: Build Login Flow
task.solution: Use context or global store for auth

challenge.title: CRUD Module
challenge.solution: Use REST APIs with loading and error states
